act:
858315 THE ESSENTIAL SERVICES (MAINTENANCE) ORDINANCE REPEAL ACT, 2001
ACT NO. 1 OF 2002 [ 4th January, 2002.]
An Act to repeal the Essential Services (Maintenance) Ordinance, 1941.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- second Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
1383252 1Short title.- This Act may be called the Essential Services (Maintenance) Ordinance Repeal Act, 2001.
1637824 2Repeal of Ord. XI of 1941.- The Essential Services (Maintenance) Ordinance, 1941 is hereby repealed. SUBHASH C. JAIN,
Secy. to the Govt. of India.
